PRIVACY POLICY

Introduction

FootballPark ('we', 'us', 'our') provides videos, blogs, and news headlines and is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines the information collected by FootballPark and how this information is used.

Information Collected

  • Personal Information: Identifiable information such as name, email address, etc., provided by users while using our website.
  • Usage Data: Anonymous data collected while using our website, like pages visited and duration of visit.

Use of Information

  • Collected information may be used for:
    • Improving the functionality of our website.
    • Personalizing user experience.
    • Sending newsletters and promotional materials (with user consent).
    • Complying with legal obligations.

Sharing of Information

  • User information may be shared with third parties only in the following circumstances:
    • Under legal obligations.
    • With user consent.
    • To protect and defend our website's security.

Cookies and Tracking Technologies

Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user experience. Users can control the use of cookies through their browser settings.

User Rights

Users have the right to access, correct, or delete their personal information collected by us. To exercise these rights, please contact us.

Changes to Privacy Policy

This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. Changes become effective once posted on our website.

Contact

For any questions or concerns, please contact us via [email address or contact form link].
